titles: Ordo distributionis sacramenti altaris sub vtraque specie, et formula confessionis faciendae in regno Angliae
author: Church of England.
Alesius, Alexander, 1500-1565.
date: Evulgata sunt octauo die Martii, anni M. D. XLVIII. [1548]
notes: A translation, by A. A. S.D.Th., i.e. A. Alesius, Scotus, Dr. Theology, of: The order of the communion.
Actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Lord's Supper (Liturgy) --  Texts --  Early works to 1800.
